# This file was generated by Jucer2Reprojucer from "10ft.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("10ft")


# list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "C:/Program Files/FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
# list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ".")
include("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CMake/Reprojucer.cmake")

set(10ft_jucer_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/10ft.jucer")

if(NOT DEFINED 10ft_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "10ft_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(10ft_jucer_FILE
  "${10ft_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.3.2"
  PROJECT_FILE "${10ft_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "xaPCEr"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "10ft"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "JUCE"
  COMPANY_WEBSITE "http://juce.com"
  PROJECT_TYPE "Audio Plug-in"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.dsbankov.10ft"
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "C++14"
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  # NOTES
  #   Audio player & waveform editor.
)

jucer_audio_plugin_settings(
  # PLUGIN_FORMATS
  # PLUGIN_CHARACTERISTICS
  # PLUGIN_NAME
  # PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION
  # PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER
  # PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER_CODE

  # PLUGIN_VST_CATEGORY
  # PLUGIN_VST3_CATEGORY
  # PLUGIN_RTAS_CATEGORY
  # PLUGIN_AAX_CATEGORY
  BUILD_VST ON
  BUILD_STANDALONE_PLUGIN ON
)
